abstract: Steven P. Jobs inspired an artist to make unwanted Apple computers his canvas.
snippet: Steven P. Jobs inspired an artist to make unwanted Apple computers his canvas.
lead_paragraph: Last week, Steven P. Jobs was remembered as a visionary who helped bring on the digital world with the Apple II personal computer and then redefined that world with sleek gizmos like the iPod, the iPad and and the iPhone. This week, he will be remembered for something else: Providing a canvas for the artist Michael Dinges.

headline.main: The Laptops Don't Work, but the Messages Get Through
